Kamu Lebih Pilih Kuota Harian, Mingguan atau Bulanan?
04 Nov 2019, 15:45 by Aisyah Kamaliah - detikInet


Foto: detikINET/Aisyah Kamaliah

Jakarta - Ada banyak pilihan paket internet yang digunakan anak muda. Kalau di Axis sendiri, baru saja diluncurkan fitur baru pada aplikasi Axisnet milik mereka."Kami ingin Axis jadi brand yang dekat dengan anak muda Indonesia. Bagaimana caranya? Ada satu cara yaitu mendengarkan mereka, dekati mereka, mendengarkan kebutuhan mereka," kata Chief Marketing Officer XL Axiata David Arcelus Oses dalam acara peluncuran fitur baru Axisnet, di Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019)."Sudah ada 5 juta unduhan Axisnet, kami akan launching hari ini, hari istimewa buat kami dengan membuat fitur baru ke pasar," jelasnya.Nah, dengan banyaknya penawaran yang diberikan Axis, internet harian, mingguan dan bulanan kira-kira anak muda paling suka pakai yang mana sih? Frengky Rinaldo Pakpahan Vice President XL Axiata West Region menjelaskannya kepada detikINET."Segmentasi Youth itu macem-macem, ada yang pengin mingguan ada yang bulanan, tapi rata-rata mereka mau yang mingguan dan bulanan. Produk kita macam-macam yang penting bagi mereka terjangkau. Axis jadi memberikan garansi penawarannya memang pas untuk mereka."Ferry Firman NA, Head of Costume Experience menambahkan dalam acara yang sama bahwa memang ada sedikit perbedaan pola dari satu orang ke orang lainnya yang kemudian dibaca oleh 'mesin pintar' mereka."Mereka isi tergantung kebutuhan mereka, kalau yang sudah SMA atau sudah kuliah rata-rata bulanan," ujarnya.Kalau detikers sendiri, lebih suka pakai internet harian, mingguan atau bulanan? Do you prefer daily, weekly or monthly quotas?
Nov 04 2019, 15:45 by Aisyah Kamaliah - detikInet


Photo: detikINET / Aisyah Kamaliah

Jakarta - There are many internet package choices that young people use. "In Axis itself, a new feature has just been launched in their Axisnet application." We want Axis to be a brand that is close to Indonesian youth. How? There is one way to listen to them, approach them, listen to their needs, "said Chief Marketing. XL Axiata Officer David Arcelus Oses in the launch of Axisnet new features, in Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019). "There are already 5 million Axisnet downloads, we will launch today, a special day for us by making new features to the market, "he explained. Well, with the many offers offered by Axis, which internet daily, weekly and monthly are most young people most likely to use? Frengky Rinaldo Pakpahan, Vice President of XL Axiata West Region explained to detikINET. "Youth Segmentation is messy, some want to have a weekly, but on average they want weekly and monthly. Our products are important for them to be affordable. "Axis gave a guarantee that the offer was right for them." Ferry Firman NA, Head of Costume Experience added in the same event that there was indeed a slight difference in patterns from one person to another which was then read by their 'smart machines'. depending on their needs, if you are already in high school or have gone to college on an average monthly basis, "he said.
